definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The electricity shortage is almost entirely the product of bad economic planning in the Chinese capital.
sentences.chinese: 電荒無疑是中國糟糕經濟計劃的產物。

sentences.english: Perhaps as the thermal power no longer entanglements, "electricity shortage" is an abrupt end.
sentences.chinese: 或許當火電不再糾結時，“電荒”也就戛然而止。
